archiefmat.titel: Minuut-notulen van vergaderingen van de Commissie (uit het gemeentebestuur) tot de zaken van de nieuwe wees-, curatele- en onbeheerde boedelkamer en opvolgers. Met bijlagen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Final draft of the minutes of the meetings of the Commission (from the municipal government) for the affairs of the New Orphans, Ownerless and Insolvent Estates Chamber and its successors. With appendices
archiefmat.notes:
Period: 9 October 1828 - 29 December 1860.

The Commission (of the municipal government) for the Affairs of the New Orphans, Ownerless and Insolvent Estates Chamber (1828 - 1832) was succeeded by the Commission for the Affairs of the New Orphans, Ownerless and Insolvent Estates Chamber (1833 - 4 March 1836), and the Board of Commissioners of the Ownerless and Insolvent Estates Department (8 March 1836 - 1876).
